website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a large tool set that has more than just ratchets and sockets, this is a good choice, but if you don't need all of the extras, a more basic set is best.
pros: With 92 sockets and 3 ratchets, this set has 165 pieces total including bits, wrenches, hex keys, and more
Superior quality typical of the brand
cons: Subpar case – tools tend to fall out when opening it, resulting in a mess if you aren't careful
Pricier than others, though you get a lot for the money – maybe more than you need

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: These Craftsman tools are made in China, and are not what they used to be. The ratchets are stiff and operate poorly. Many of the sockets are so thin, they look like they would break if really torqued on. Definitely not worth the money. Disappointing that a name that used to be associated with quality tools was put on such a poor product.
customer_reviews.author: GBZ

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if fake craftsman!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the are knockoffs feels like cheap Korean set
customer_reviews.author: glenn pond

customer_reviews.title: Tool set overall is nice. The case holds all pieces if you put ...
customer_reviews.text: Tool set overall is nice. The case holds all pieces if you put away correctly. Biggest thing I hate about this kit, a lot of plastic parts on the tools! Very delicate too. Have not broken one yet, but you can tell by touching them that you will have to exchange it at some point. They definitely do not make tools to last anymore. There should NEVER be plastic parts on quality tools, Craftsman use to be prideful about quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Uher

customer_reviews.title: Nice set..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a set for my airplane so I wouldn't have to keep moving tools back and forth from my house to the hangar. I really like the set and have noticed several improvements Craftsman made to their socket sets since purchasing the bulk of my tools in the '80's. Case is easy to open and does a great job keeping things where they need to be. Millennials don't need these tools as they either tell daddy to fix their stuff or drop off their repair work at the dealer and use a credit card to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve,  the man...

customer_reviews.title: Different set delivered from that shown
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed as what was delivered is different from what was shown in the photos. There is no 1/2 drive ratchet handle and it only has 4 wrenches
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed buyer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This
customer_reviews.text: First of all what i got is not what i bought! The tool box is different than the one in the picture. It is 165 pieces but totally different. Besides the quality of this "craftsman" tools are really really poor. I totally regret of buying this.
customer_reviews.author: William Pino

customer_reviews.title: this was the PERFECT set for my husband who's an electrician
customer_reviews.text: After much shopping around, both in store and online, this was the PERFECT set for my husband who's an electrician. This has every piece and size he needs both for work and home. We have a ranch with horses and this came in handy when we needed to take down the stalls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crapsman
customer_reviews.text: It's Crapsman tools! Used to be high quality now mediocre. Still lifetime warranty, but don't know where you can take it to swap out broken pieces since Sears is going out of business. Still better than Stanley, Kobalt, or Husky!!!
customer_reviews.author: JeepCJ7

customer_reviews.title: A good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it went up to 1". The case is much improved over the previous case.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It’s Craftsmen....
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like about this is the case itself. The sockets and accessories tend to fall out very easily and not stay in place. It is a design flaw in the case itself (MHO). I’ll live with it... but I will not be buying the addition 20 I needed for my work crews.
customer_reviews.author: TOM C

customer_reviews.title: Missing tools!!!
customer_reviews.text: There were sooo many sockets mssing from the box. Also ALL the ratchets were missing. How does that happen?! Do not buy. Also there was a USED screw driver in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product
customer_reviews.text: They are not the same as the ones I had that were made in the United States, but still they are of excellent quality. And the best thing is that, like the previous ones, these also have guarantee of life. Excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Arnoldo Paris

customer_reviews.title: Low quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I changed 5he rotors and brake pads on my car and quickly broke both ratchets. And I use my tools with care.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jordan Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Great set.  Really good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set. I’ve seen several complaints about Craftsman quality. I have Craftsman tool sets from the early 80s and this set is as good quality as them. Really functional set and great quality. Very good value!
customer_reviews.author: K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman 165 pc Mechanics Tool Set # 36165
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out which was the 'real' top, this is great. If you open it upside down, like I did the first time, you will be picking up. Seems to be Craftsman quality but only time will tell. A lot of tools for the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: REPLACEMENT TOOLS
customer_reviews.text: Our nephew lost his home in the Paradise/Camp Fire in California. He is an excellent mechanic so missed having tools. This set fit the bill - some of everything.
customer_reviews.author: LyndyMD

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit, the Allen wrenches are in bags but everything else fits well and snug, definitely recommend as a replacement for those who haven't replaced their old mismatched set of tools in a while
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift (he loved it) and now I need to buy another one for me! Multiple sizes for all your home/ auto repair needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jade R.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this set. I got it for him for Christmas and it had everything he needs!
customer_reviews.author: Sashaaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Good tools for the money. Made for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools for a beginner. Bought these for my son They have a nice case and easy to make sure everything has a place. They’re Craftsman they are good tools. Good tool for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great tool kit, worth considering!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tool kit, great quality. This was a drop ship by Kmart so perhaps check their prices and cut out the middle man?

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy set of tools, organized very well and easy to carry around and store.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: As a former aircraft mechanic this kit is very well priced for the quality. The items are smartly placed in the kit and easy to access. Well done!

customer_reviews.title: Set has everything I need for the small mechanic work ...
customer_reviews.text: Set has everything I need for the small mechanic work I do on my personal vehicles. The set arrived on time. I haven’t used the set a lot at this point but when and if I have any issues I will write a new review.

customer_reviews.text: It's a nice set. Gifted it to my son who is a plummer. Easy for him to carry on the job.

customer_reviews.title: Almost everything
customer_reviews.text: Both as a starter, and as a way to fill in an existing set, I've used more pieces than I thought I would. Other than a channel locks, adjustable wrench, or pliers, this set has exactly what i needed.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: A few scrape on the finish but this bad boy fits the bill for our FTC team at school. Also builds your muscles and finger gripping just moving and opening the case. Lifetime warranty of course is a big plus.

customer_reviews.text: By far one of the most complete tool boxes on the market. Tools are of expected craftsman quality.

customer_reviews.text: Great tools, work on my car with them and did everything I had to The only down side is that it doesn’t come with a 6 inch extension, only a 3 inch

customer_reviews.title: The name Craftsman is all you need to know

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you need if you are a craftsman. My husband couldn't be happier. The only complaint I have is the design of the case, we opened ours up and everything just fell out. The inside lock flap almost seems as if it is on the wrong side. It should be on the side of the sockets to keep them from falling out but instead it is on the side with the wrenches. This is silly because all of the wrenches are already locked in place. I took a star off for the poor pointless design.
customer_reviews.author: jlBostick

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and arrived in perfect condition... Very pleased. Thank you!!!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool set.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to replace one i have had 34 years. I can say this is one of the most complete sets i have owned. It has everything you need from 1/4 - 1/2 drive to include metric and standard allen wrenches. It has everything you need to work on a car to putting things together. The quality is great. As it should be. It is Craftsman. Extremely happy and recommend to others.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are among the highest quality sockets available. Every normal size with metric sizes too.Remember to lock the case when finished or you will be struggling with a 165 piece jigsaw puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? They are Craftsman.
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman tools are hands down the best of there and this set is amazing. It has most everything you need securely in one very convenient spot. Stores easily, is compact but each piece is really accessed. Tools are strong enough to get any job done. Highly recommend that anyone, not just men with tendencies to collect tools. :)

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit for the price. Nice heavy duty set dont get any lower number of kit this ones worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Stay single
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set to try and fix my motorcycle. Too bad I can't use it to fix my marriage.

customer_reviews.title: Best tool set
customer_reviews.text: Best tool set. Has majority or the items that are usable. I hate those kits that inflate the piece count with allen wrenches and screwdriver heads. The deep sockets are the best addition to this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good friend. Only needs a rubber ring on the 5/8 for spark plugs

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a nice set. The only flaw is the sockets are ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a nice set. The only flaw is the sockets are loose in the case and don't snap in on the top. The case was dinted on the corner when I received but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gifts I could evey purchase for someone! As a twenty something female (not to be too stereotypical) I don't know much about tools, but this came with pretty much everything that my boyfriend would ever need to tinker with his vehicles.

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery took awhile. Purchased it as a gift. Son loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Just got this. Maybe it's me. But every ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. Maybe it's me. But every time I open this, every single tool falls out and I have to spend 10 min putting the set back together. Poorly designed case. The tools just lay inside with nothing to secure them. No indication of which side is top or bottom either.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Burton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THESE TOOLS ARE GREAT AND FOR THE PRICE YOU CAN'T GET ANY BETTER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Craftsman 165 pc Mechanics Tool Set # 36165
product_meta.description: Includes 165 pieces 79 6 pt. sockets in 1/4", 3/8", and 1/2" drive size 61 screw and nut driver bits 14 hex keys 2 quick-release ratchets 2 extension bar 2 adapters 4 wrenches 1 magnetic handle Chrome-plated, tough cast alloy steel construction Durable rust-resistant, dent-resistant carrying case
feature_bullets: Chrome plated, tough cast alloy steel construction Includes 79 6-point sockets in 1/4", 3/8", and 1/2" drive sizes; 61 screw and nut driver bits; 14 hex keys; 2 quick release ratchets; 2 extension Bars; 2 adapters; 4 wrenches and 1 magnetic handle Quick release mechanism in ratchets for quick socket switches Rust-resistant and dent-resistant box for ensured longevity Craftsman Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars268 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
